ampharosite.zhDesc: 电龙携带可进行超级进化

grassyseed.desc: If the terrain is Grassy Terrain, raises holder's Defense by 1 stage. Single use.
grassyseed.zhDesc: 当场地为青草场地时防御提升一级，使用后消失
grassyseed.name: Grassy Seed

icyrock.desc: Holder's use of Hail lasts 8 turns instead of 5.
icyrock.zhDesc: 引起的冰雹天气从5回合延长至8回合
icyrock.name: Icy Rock

lycaniumz.desc: Lycanroc/Lycanroc-Midnight/Lycanroc-Dusk w/ Stone Edge: Splintered Stormshards.
lycaniumz.name: Lycanium Z

psncureberry.desc: (Gen 2) Holder is cured if it is poisoned. Single use.
psncureberry.name: PSN Cure Berry
psncureberry.zhDesc: （第二世代限定），解除中毒状态，使用后消失

mysteryberry.desc: (Gen 2) Restores 5 PP to the first of the holder's moves to reach 0 PP. Single use.
mysteryberry.name: Mystery Berry
mysteryberry.zhDesc: （第二世代限定）招式的PP降到0时恢复该招式10点PP，使用后消失

redcard.desc: If holder survives a hit, attacker is forced to switch to a random ally. Single use.
redcard.zhDesc: 受到伤害后攻击方随机交换任意宝可梦，使用后消失
redcard.name: Red Card

rockincense.zhDesc: 岩石属性的招式威力提升20%
rockincense.name: Rock Incense

decidiumz.desc: If holder is a Decidueye with Spirit Shackle, it can use Sinister Arrow Raid.
decidiumz.zhDesc: 狙射树枭携带后可以将缝影转化成Z招式：遮天蔽日暗影箭
decidiumz.name: Decidium Z

razorfang.desc: Holder's attacks without a chance to flinch gain a 10% chance to flinch.
razorfang.zhDesc: 使用不会陷入畏缩状态的攻击招式时有10%的几率使目标进入畏缩状态
razorfang.name: Razor Fang

razzberry.desc: Cannot be eaten by the holder. No effect when eaten with Bug Bite or Pluck.
razzberry.zhDesc: 用于制作宝可方块或宝芬，被虫咬或啄食时没有效果
razzberry.name: Razz Berry
